name: Kingcake
tagline: An IDL implementation of a LAS file reader/writer
body:
kingcake
========

The laslib class is an IDL implementation of a LAS file reader/writer. 
The class object can read, write and manipulate points and/or full waveforms contain in the binary LAS file format. It can handle any LAS 1.0, 1.1, 1.2, 1.3 with point format 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5.

We are well aware that releasing "open source" code in IDL might not sounds as open as C/C++ code, but at Carbomap we use this library every day in our processing workflow with fast and efficient results in LiDAR data manipulations.

For the C/C++ coders/users, we will release new exciting tools in the upcoming months.

We hope you'll enjoy it as much as we do every day.

Please report any bugs or issues at info at carbomap dot com.

Carbomap has a joint expertise of more than ten years in lidar full waveform data processing. This includes bathymetric, topographic, mobile and terrestrical lidar sytems.

As for the name of the release, it celebrates the New Orleans pastry of Mardi Gras :: the King cake.

Enjoy.
-----------------------
